attributes.review: When I got this app I was living in my nice apartment in Montana. I was happy. I had just moved away from home; ready to spread my independent wings. I open the app and immediately my phone starts to ring, I get a knock at the door, my tv turns on, my microwave starts going, and my hairdryer exploded. Iâ€™m very calm under pressure so I answer the call and start walking to the door. When I answered the call it was Trump himself telling me to sacrifice myself to him. I thought the call was sketchy so I hung up but I was flattered that Trump called little ole me. Anyway I ask the person behind my door â€œWho is it?â€ They replied with â€œorangeâ€. I wasnâ€™t going to be fooled by this old joke so I said â€œOrange you glad I didnâ€™t say orange?â€. I heard a deep sign from behind the door. Haha, I won. Better luck next time, bucko. I open up the door to a man selling oranges. (They were old and brown so I declined the oranges) He said â€œYOUâ€™LL RUE THIS DAY. RUE IT!â€, That sentence sounded awfully familiar but I decided to close my door anyway. So, I walk to my microwave to turn it off, but to my surprise-it wasnâ€™t there. â€œI swear I just heard itâ€, I said to myself. I tried looking for it but I couldnâ€™t, so I walk to the bathroom to address the hairdryer situation. I open the bathroom door and there it is. My hairdryer in the microwave. â€œHow did that get in here?â€ I said. The microwave has a humongous hole through the top of it due to the exploded hairdryer. I decided to take the hairdryer filled microwave to the garbage outside. As I go downstairs out of the corner of my eye I see the orange selling man take off his skin. He sees me see him and I start to bolt. Thankfully I always keep my car keys on me so I ran to my car. I drop the microwave to get rid of the weight. But then I hear the man with ripped skin stop at the pile of junk. Then I hear him breath in. He has become stronger now. Faster even. I never turned around and beelined for the car. I scrambled to get the keys in the car but I eventually do. I get in the car and lock it just as the man tries to get in. Iâ€™m safe now. But as I look at the man I realize something. He looks...familiar. I gasp â€œMR. TRUMP!â€ I slammed my foot on the gas while I hear the president scream â€œREPENT AND SACRIFICE YOURSELF FOR MEâ€ and I drove off running over his foot. I head back to my hometown only ever stopping to get gas. Itâ€™s been two months now and Iâ€™m back in my hometown...hiding. I have nightmares every night of him ripping off his skin, breathing in the microwave/hairdryer, and running towards me as I get in my car. Every day I have daydreams of my old life. My old life where I had freedom, freedom to live without fearing for my life of that sick, old, orange fleshed, man. I live in dumpsters and ask people for food. I always see missing people papers of me. But I know thatâ€™s just the president trying to get me. In conclusion, donâ€™t buy this app.
